team.name: Satoshi Nakajima
team.what: Software architect of Windows95 and Founder of Xevo Inc. (Noun245 Owner)

items.name: Event Expenses
items.description: 150,000 yen (theater), Travel and transportation expenses 300,000 yen (awardees), 500,000 yen (others)

description:
The Nouns Art Festival (NounsFes) is an online film art contest and festival. The first event, held in 2022, was financed by the 5ETH Small Grant from Nouns DAO. Primarily successful in Japan, we're planning to host the second event in 2023. This year, we aim to expand globally and attract more participants than before. The main objectives of the festival include:

Spreading awareness about the importance of a peaceful and sustainable Earth
Materializing the "Public Good" concept, which is integral to Nouns' principles
Broadening Nouns' recognition to a wider audience
In this proposal, we request a budget of 47.1ETH to accomplish these goals. The details follow.

project.name: NounsFes
project.description: NounsFes is an online art festival, conceived by the members of NounsDAO, aiming to educate as many people as possible about the importance of a peaceful and sustainable Earth.

title: NounsFes 2023
